content: Yes, I am familiar with that episode. "AWESOM-O" is the fifth episode of the eighth season of the animated television series South Park, which originally aired on April 14, 2004. In this episode, Cartman dresses up as a robot named AWESOM-O to try and learn Butters' deepest secrets, but things quickly get out of hand as Butters begins to confide in AWESOM-O about embarrassing personal information. The episode is known for its humor and satire of Hollywood culture, as well as its exploration of the theme of deception and how people are often willing to believe what they want to believe, even when it defies common sense.
